Name: 4x4 Dream Race
About the game: You drive a 4x4 monster truck in 4 different races. Try to make it to the top 3 to qualify for the next battle. But be careful, You are not alone on the track. Stay on the road if you want to make full use of your 4x4â€™s speed and power and don't miss any of the checkpoints on the way!
